header.title: C# setup
header.teaser: This is the space for click bait

body: Just recently, I decided to try my hand at C#. I have some experience with both Java, and C/C++, so I thought that C# might make an interesting addition.
As someone who for the last 10 years or so has been using linux almost exclusively, I was expecting anything .NET (Microsoft driven) to be... painful to set up, to say the least.
However, I'm happy to say that I was wrong. The mono project makes this a dream. You even get an IDE, if your tastes run that way.
